pythagoras.d

Class Line

  • java.lang.Object
    • pythagoras.d.AbstractLine
      • pythagoras.d.Line
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Cloneable, ILine, IShape

    public class Line
extends AbstractLine
implements Serializable
    Represents a line segment.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      double x1
      The x-coordinate of the start of this line segment.
      double x2
      The x-coordinate of the end of this line segment.
      double y1
      The y-coordinate of the start of this line segment.
      double y2
      The y-coordinate of the end of this line segment.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Line()
      Creates a line from (0,0) to (0,0).
      Line(double x1, double y1, double x2, double y2)
      Creates a line from (x1,y1), to (x2,y2).
      Line(XY p1, XY p2)
      Creates a line from p1 to p2.

    • Method Summary
